summary: REQ-4 (version bump) is evidenced by updating APP_VERSION to 0.4.111. For REQ-1/2/3, FileList.tsx is truncated in the diff excerpt and does not show the relevant UI sections, so the requested UI restores cannot be verified from the provided evidence. Additionally, two non-requested files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) were modified, which violates the “No other changes” constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore file/folder row action buttons in List view so they are visible at all times (not only on mouse hover), while keeping tooltips on those action buttons.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff excerpt for FileList.tsx is truncated before any row rendering / action-button logic, so there is no evidence that row actions were made always-visible or that tooltips were preserved.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore the top action buttons in the File Browser header area to use labeled buttons (not icon-only) with no tooltips, and enforce the button order: Upload Files, then Upload Folder, then Create Folder.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt does not include the File Browser header/top action buttons rendering; therefore there is no evidence of labeled buttons, tooltip removal, or the required ordering.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore the clickable folder path/breadcrumb context when viewing search results so users can click the displayed path to navigate to the containing folder.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt does not include the search results rendering, so there is no evidence that a clickable breadcrumb/path is shown during search, nor that clicking navigates to the containing folder and exits search mode.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json (metadata/new_feature_requests/status tracking) even though the request constrained changes to only UI restores and version bump (“No other changes!”).
hallucinated_features.reason: This file change is not part of any REQ-1..REQ-4 acceptance criteria and conflicts with the explicit constraint to avoid other changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt, which is not part of the requested UI restores or version bump.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not ask to update any documentation/summary artifacts; also the constraint says no other changes beyond the specified UI restores and version bump.
